00009 /**
00010  * systemwide locking mechanism with timeout for critical sections or eventhandlers
00011  *
00012  * @package kata
00013  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00014  */
00015 class LockUtility {
00016              /**
00017               * @var integer seconds to wait until we timeout
00018               */
00019              private $timeout= 10;
00020 
00021              /**
00022               * @var array holds lock-status
00023               */
00024              private $locks= array ();
00025 
00026              /**
00027               * @param integer $timout how many seconds to wait for a lock before we fail
00028               */
00029              public function setTimeout($timeout) {
00030                           if (is_numeric($timeout) && ($timeout > 0)) {
00031                                        $this->timeout= $timeout;
00032                                        return true;
00033                           }
00034                           return false;
00035              }
00036 
00037              /**
00038               * Lock a user id
00039               *
00040               * @param int $id, id of the user to lock.
00041               * @param bool $waitForTimeout, wait for time out
00042               * @return bool, returns true if the user was locked
00043               */
00044              function lock($id, $waitForTimeout= true) {
00045                           if (substr(PHP_OS, 0, 3) == 'WIN') {
00046                                        return true;
00047                           }
00048 
00049                           $timeout= time() + $this->timeout;
00050                           $lockname= KATATMP.'sessions'.DS.'lockfile'.urlencode($id);
00051                           $fplock= null;
00052 
00053                           kataMakeTmpPath('sessions');
00054 
00055                           while ((time() < $timeout) && $waitForTimeout) {
00056                                        if ($fplock= fopen($lockname, "w+")) {
00057                                                     if (flock($fplock, LOCK_EX | LOCK_NB)) {
00058                                                                  break;
00059                                                     }
00060                                                     if ($fplock) {
00061                                                                  fclose($fplock);
00062                                                                  $fplock= null;
00063                                                     }
00064                                        }
00065                                        usleep(100000);
00066                           }
00067 
00068                           if ($fplock) {
00069                                        $this->locks[$id]= $fplock;
00070                                        return true;
00071                           }
00072 
00073                           return false;
00074              }
00075 
00076              /**
00077               * Unlock a user id
00078               *
00079               * @param int $id, id of the user to lock
00080               * @return true if the user was unlocked
00081               */
00082              function unlock($id) {
00083                           if (substr(PHP_OS, 0, 3) == 'WIN') {
00084                                        return true;
00085                           }
00086 
00087                           if (!isset($this->locks[$id])) {
00088                                        if (DEBUG > 0) {
00089                                                     throw new Exception("user $userid not locked");
00090                                        }
00091                                        return false;
00092                           }
00093 
00094                           $fplock= $this->locks[$id];
00095                           flock($fplock, LOCK_UN);
00096                           fclose($fplock);
00097 
00098                           @ unlink(KATATMP.'sessions'.DS.'lockfile'.urlencode($id));
00099                           unset ($this->locks[$id]);
00100                           return true;
00101              }
00102 
00103              function __destruct() {
00104                           if (count($this->locks) > 0) {
00105                                        if (DEBUG > 0) {
00106                                                     throw new Exception("these locks have not been unlocked:".print_r($this->locks, true));
00107                                        }
00108                           }
00109              }
00110 
00111 }
